items.title: Responsive
items.description: Responsive offcanvas classes hide content outside the viewport from a specified breakpoint and down. Above that breakpoint, the contents within will behave as usual. For example, .offcanvas-lg hides content in an offcanvas below the lg breakpoint, but shows the content above the lg breakpoint.
